changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE kspu_db."calendardetailsfromprs" (dato timestamp, isholiday char(2), isearlyweekfirstday char(2), isearlyweeksecondday char(2), ismidweekfirstday char(2), ismidweeksecondday char(2), frequencytype char(2), weekno bigint, lastmodifieddate timestamp ) ;
